title: Charlize Theron looks chic in studded leather jacket at ELLE's Annual Women In Hollywood Celebration
text:
Charlize Theron looked stunning in a black and blue ensemble at ELLE's 26th Annual Women In Hollywood Celebration.

The 44 year old South Africa native stepped out in style at the event, held at the Four Seasons Hotel in Los Angeles on Monday night.

Theron also took to Instagram to share a snap of her hugging comedian and actress Ali Wong.

Red carpet look: Theron was wearing a black and grey and gold turtleneck sweater under a waist-length black leather coat

Theron was wearing a black and grey and gold turtleneck sweater under a waist-length black leather coat.

She also wore a royal blue knee-length skirt and a pair of black heeled boots for her appearance at the celebration.

She completed her look with a white handbag with black trim with small diamond earrings.

Charlize's look: Charlize Theron looked stunning in a black and blue ensemble at ELLE's 26th Annual Women In Hollywood Celebration

Honored: The event honored 10 different women - Scarlett Johansson, Mindy Kaling, Nicole Kidman, Melina Matsoukas, Gwyneth Paltrow, Dolly Parton, Natalie Portman, Jodie Turner-Smith, Lena Waithe, and Zendaya

She also took to Instagram to share a photo of her giving comedian Ali Wong a hug at the event.

'I maaay have been a little too aggressive with my hugging. That’s just how I truly feel about @aliwong. This woman inspires me on every level,' Theron said.

Wong was wearing a multi-colored striped sweatshirt and thin-rimmed glasses with her black hair pulled back.

Red carpet look: She also wore a royal blue knee-length skirt and a pair of black heeled boots for her appearance at the celebration

The event honored 10 different women - Scarlett Johansson, Mindy Kaling, Nicole Kidman, Melina Matsoukas, Gwyneth Paltrow, Dolly Parton, Natalie Portman, Jodie Turner-Smith, Lena Waithe, and Zendaya,

The ladies were honored for their, 'creative and cultural contributions they have made to the worlds of music, film, television, and beyond.

Each of the women will each grace the November covers of ELLE, on newsstands nationwide on October 22nd.

Charlize and Ali: She also took to Instagram to share a photo of her giving comedian Ali Wong a hug at the event

Theron voices Morticia Addams in the new animated movie The Addams Family, which debuted last weekend.

She'll next be seen as former Fox News anchor Megyn Kelly in Bombshell, following the women who helped bring down former Fox News chairman Roger Ailes.

The actress also returns as Cipher in Fast & Furious 9, which is currently filming in, and Lorraine Broughton in the upcoming sequel Atomic Blonde 2.

Voice role: Theron voices Morticia Addams in the new animated movie The Addams Family, which debuted last weekend
description: Charlize Theron looked stunning in a black and blue ensemble at ELLE's 26th Annual Women In Hollywood Celebration.
